pages.text: Slot machines are a fun way to gamble away everything you've worked for thus far.$(br2)Slot machines have a chance to double, triple, or even quadruple whatever items you put in, but can also take away those items forever.$(br2)To use one, put the item(s) you want to gamble in your off-hand and right click the machine.

Slot machines can be found in a $(l:terramity:structures/chthonic_dungeon)Chthonic Dungeon$().$(br2)Slot machines have different odds and returns. One slot machine may triple whatever you put in but have lower odds, where another slot machine may double what you put in with higher odds. Slot machines with higher returns are more likely to have lower odds.

Breaking and placing a slot machine back down will reroll the odds and returns.$(br2)There is no way to check the odds on a slot machine, so be careful before gambling away your entire storage system.
